metadata.Title: CVE-2014-8764 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: DokuWiki 2014-05-05a and earlier, when using Active Directory for LDAP authentication, allows remote attackers to bypass authentication via a user name and password starting with a null (\0) character, which triggers an anonymous bind.

criterions.comment: dokuwiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
